room_title: Escape room "Pirate Treasure" by Escape on Main in St. Louis
review: Had a great time doing the pirate treasure room! Had some really clever puzzles, and a decent immersive set design. Shout out to the owner for being flexible with the schedule and allowing us to play before my flight back to LA!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Treasure" by Escape on Main in St. Louis
review: My husband and I have done two other escape rooms and we loved the experience of the Pirate Treasure room! It was a very good and a well thought out room with clues scrambled around that we had to decipher.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Treasure" by Escape on Main in St. Louis
review: Awesome fun! Everyone should try it! We found the Treasure! Definitley coming back and trying a different room!
